title: Riot please help me its important
body: So i wanna do something with my gmail but i dont remember it.. and when i go to change it and put my new one it says incorect password... and i do put the normal one. when i go to change password it says we sended a code to my old gmail that i dont remember!! and i cant change my password i need to change it because my friend knows it too.

replies.body: Hit up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by choosing I need help recovering my account. We can't do account verification from here on the boards, but once you verify yourself in your ticket those agents should be able to help you out with your password and that email issue.
yes.. but it says it needs more information and i dont remember.
